code: import React from'react';import{Routes,Route,Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{WebSocketProvider}from'./context/WebSocketContext';import Dashboard from'./components/Dashboard/Dashboard';import RuleManagement from'./components/Rules/RuleManagement';import AlertHistory from'./components/History/AlertHistory';import SystemHealth from'./components/Health/SystemHealth';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WebSocketProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"app-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"app-title",children:"TradeAssist Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"main-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/'?'active':''),children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/rules",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/rules'?'active':''),children:"Alert Rules"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/history",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/history'?'active':''),children:"History"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/health",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/health'?'active':''),children:"System Health"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"app-main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/rules",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RuleManagement,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/history",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertHistory,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/health",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SystemHealth,{})})]})})]})})});};export default App;
